member.name: IMFSAMIStyle.GetSelectedStyle
member.summary: Gets the current style from the SAMI media source.
member.param: Receives a pointer to a null-terminated string that contains the name of the style. If no style is currently set, the method returns an empty string. The caller must free the memory for the string by calling .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSAMIStyle.GetStyleCount
member.summary: Gets the number of styles defined in the SAMI file.
member.param: Receives the number of SAMI styles in the file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSAMIStyle.GetStyles
member.summary: Gets a list of the style names defined in the SAMI file.
member.param: Pointer to a PROPVARIANT that receives an array of null-terminated wide-character strings. The PROPVARIANT type is VT_VECTOR | VT_LPWSTR. The caller must clear the PROPVARIANT by calling PropVariantClear.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSAMIStyle.SetSelectedStyle
member.summary: Sets the current style on the SAMI media source.
member.param: Pointer to a null-terminated string containing the name of the style. To clear the current style, pass an empty string (""). To get the list of style names, call .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSAMIStyle
member.summary: Sets and retrieves Synchronized Accessible Media Interchange (SAMI) styles on the SAMI Media Source.
